original_text:
The children of your bereavement
    will yet say in your ears:
‘The place is too narrow for me;
    make room for me to dwell in.’
korean_text: 자식을 잃었을 때에 낳은 자녀가 후일에 네 귀에 말하기를 이곳이 내게 좁으니 넓혀서 내가 거주하게 하라 하리니

sentences.original_text: The children of your bereavement will yet say in your ears:
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 상실한 자녀들이 당신의 귀에 말하기를

sentences.original_text: ‘The place is too narrow for me;
make room for me to dwell in.’
